ad_text: Northern Lakes Nursing & Rehabilitation Center Sponsored "We are not a team because we work together, we are a team because we respect, trust, and care for each other." These faces will be familiar to many of you, and to some, they feel like family! When you come into our facility you are going to see someone you know! We are PROUD of the longevity of our nursing staff and proud of these long term nurses!! You won't find a team of nurses like this anywhere else! And our nurse leaders are beyond compare, too!! Don't believe me?? Join us to find out! We are actively interviewing for 2nd shift nurses to add to our family!! Give me a call or, better yet, just stop in to see me! I'll fill you in on some of the extra benefits not listed below! 😊-Mandi Fritz, LPN Director of Staff Development 516 Williams St., Angola, IN 46703 260-665-9467 office 260-573-6908 cell amanda@northernlakesnursing.com Northern Lakes Nursing & Rehabilitation Center Nursing Home, Medical Service, Retirement Center Send message
